25637.name: Bracer of Radiance
25637.passive:
Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this glow gain 10% increased Power if above half health or 10% Movement Speed if below Half Health for 8s. This fragment acts as a ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 120s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

25638.name: Greater Bracer of Radiance
25638.passive:
Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this glow gain 10% increased Power if above half health or 10% Movement Speed if below Half Health for 8s. This fragment acts as a ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 100s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Deal instances of damage or Crowd Control to enemy Gods to upgrade this Relic for free. You may only gain one stack per second.

25639.name: Bracer of Brilliance
25639.passive: Place a radiant glow at a target location for 90s. Allies who move through this field gain 10% increased Power and 15% Movement Speed for 8s. This fragment acts as a Sentry Ward. If destroyed the cooldown of the relic is reduced by 20s. Cooldown - 100s.

25652.name: Aegis Amulet
25652.passive:
Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Cooldown - 170s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

25653.name: Greater Aegis Amulet
25653.passive:
Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Cooldown - 140s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Deal instances of damage or Crowd Control to enemy Gods to upgrade this Relic for free. You may only gain one stack per second.

25654.name: Aegis of Acceleration
25654.passive: Using this item makes you invulnerable to damage and healing for 1.5s, and prevents you from taking any actions. You may still move. Each instance of damage prevented in this time provides you 7% Movement Speed for 4s, stacking up to 3 times. Cooldown - 140s.

25655.name: Shield of Thorns
25655.passive:
Using this item grants you 15% Damage Mitigation as you store all damage taken over the next 3s. You then explode in a 30 unit radius, dealing 85 + 50% of the damage taken as Magical Damage, up to a maximum of 25% of an enemy’s Max Health. While this is active, enemies can only lifesteal from you for 75% of their total lifesteal. Cooldown - 140s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

25656.name: Greater Shield of Thorns
25656.passive:
Using this item grants you 15% Damage Mitigation as you store all damage taken over the next 3s. You then explode in a 30 unit radius, dealing 85 + 50% of the damage taken as Magical Damage, up to a maximum of 25% of an enemy’s Max Health. While this is active, enemies can only lifesteal from you for 75% of their total lifesteal. Cooldown - 120s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Deal instances of damage or Crowd Control to enemy Gods to upgrade this Relic for free. You may only gain one stack per second.

25657.name: Thorns of Judgement
25657.passive: Using this item grants you 15% Damage Mitigation as you store all damage taken over the next 3s. You then explode in a 30 unit radius, dealing 85 + 50% of the damage taken as Magical Damage, up to a maximum of 25% of an enemy’s Max Health. While this is active, enemies can only lifesteal from you for 50% of their total lifesteal. Each basic attack from enemy gods reduces the cooldown of this item by 0.5s. Cooldown - 120s.

25668.name: Book of Thoth
25668.passive: PASSIVE - You permanently gain 12 Mana per Stack, and receive 1 Stack per 900 Damage Dealt to minions or 450 Damage Dealt to gods. You gain Magical Power equal to 4% of your Mana from items. At 50 stacks this item Evolves, gaining 10 Magical Penetration and increasing the Magical Power gained from Mana to 7%.

25669.name: Transcendence
25669.passive: PASSIVE - You permanently gain 15 Mana per Stack, and receive 1 Stack per 800 Damage Dealt to minions or 350 Damage Dealt to gods. You gain Physical Power equal to 2% of your Maximum Mana. At 50 stacks this item Evolves, gaining 10 Physical Penetration.

25670.name: Devourer's Gauntlet
25670.passive: PASSIVE - You permanently gain 0.4 Physical Power, 0.2 Physical Penetration, and 0.15% Physical Lifesteal per Stack, and receive 1 Stack per 600 Damage Dealt to minions or 300 Damage Dealt to gods. At 50 stacks this item Evolves, gaining 5 Physical Penetration.

25671.name: Warlock's Staff
25671.passive: PASSIVE - You permanently gain +3 Health and +0.25 Magical Power per Stack, and receive 1 Stack per 550 Damage Dealt to or taken from minions or 275 Damage Dealt to or taken by gods. At 100 stacks this item Evolves, gaining 10% Magical Penetration.

25673.name: Evolved Book of Thoth
25673.passive: PASSIVE - You gain Magical Power equal to 7% of your Mana from items.

25675.name: Evolved Transcendence
25675.passive: PASSIVE - You gain Physical Power equal to 2% of your Maximum Mana.

25728.name: Rejuvenating Heart
25728.passive: PASSIVE - Lifestealing off of enemy gods heals yourself and nearby allies within 55 units of you by 75% of that healing.

25749.name: Soul Eater
25749.passive: PASSIVE - Your abilities heal you for 4% of damage dealt. Each time anything dies within 80 units you gain a stack. Gods, Large Jungle monsters and Bosses provide 5 stacks. At 100 Stacks Soul Eater Evolves, gaining 15 Physical Power, 10 Penetration, 6% Physical Lifesteal, and 11% Physical Ability Lifesteal.

25750.name: Asi
25750.passive: PASSIVE - While below 60% Health, you gain an additional 22.5% Physical Lifesteal for 5 seconds.  Can only occur once every 15 seconds.

25751.name: Bloodforge
25751.passive: PASSIVE - Killing an enemy god forges a shield from their blood with Health equal to 200 + 10 per Player Level for 20s. While the Blood Shield is active you gain +10% Movement Speed.

25752.name: Serrated Edge
25752.passive: PASSIVE - For every non-ultimate ability on cooldown you gain a stack of Cruelty. Each stack provides 7 Physical Power and 3% Physical Lifesteal.

25755.name: Bound Gauntlet
25755.passive: PASSIVE - Your abilities heal you for 4% of damage dealt.

25756.name: Evolved Soul Eater
25756.passive: PASSIVE - Your abilities heal you for 15% of the damage dealt to targets.

25758.name: Talon Trinket
25758.passive: PASSIVE - Each second you are in god combat, gain 1 Magical Power and 1% Lifesteal for 5s. Max 20 stacks.

25760.name: Soul Gem
25760.passive: PASSIVE - On successful hit of an Ability you gain 1 stack. At 3 Stacks your next Ability that damages an enemy God will deal bonus damage equal to 25% of your Magical power to each God hit, and will heal yourself and allies within 20 units for 30 (+5 Per Level) and will consume the 3 stacks.

25761.name: Telkhines Ring
25761.passive: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks deal bonus damage of 5 (+3 Per Level). This effect does not hit structures.

25762.name: Bancroft's Talon
25762.passive: PASSIVE - You gain additional Magical Power and Lifesteal scaled from missing Health. This caps at 70 power and 15% Lifesteal at 40% Health.

25763.name: Bancroft's Claw
25763.passive: PASSIVE - You gain additional Magical Power and Lifesteal scaled from missing Health. This caps at 70 power and 15% Lifesteal at 40% Health. <n>GLYPH - Every 10s gain a stack of Hunger(max 3). Abilities cast within 30 units of enemy gods consume a stack, dealing bonus damage equal to 1% of their max HP for each 75 Magical Power you have. Each god damaged by Hunger provides you with a shield of 1% of your Max HP for each 75 Magical Power you have. This cannot exceed 35% of your Max HP.

25764.name: Nimble Bancroft's Talon
25764.passive: PASSIVE - You gain additional Magical Power and Lifesteal scaled from missing Health. This caps at 70 power and 15% Lifesteal at 40% Health. <n>GLYPH - For every 30 Magical Power you have, you gain 2 Basic Attack Power and 2% Attack Speed.

25765.name: Typhon's Fang
25765.passive: PASSIVE - Your Healing obtained from Magical Lifesteal is increased by 15%. Your Magical power is increased by 1.5x the amount of Magical Lifesteal you have.

25766.name: Polynomicon
25766.passive: PASSIVE - Using an ability gives your next Basic Attack within the next 8 seconds +75% of your Magical Power as additional Magical Damage. The effect can only apply once every 2 seconds.

25767.name: Spear of the Magus
25767.passive: PASSIVE - Whenever you damage an enemy god with an ability you mark them to take 5% increased damage from all sources. This effect lasts for 8s and can only occur once every 8s.

25768.name: Pythagorem's Piece
25768.passive: AURA - Allied gods within 70 units have their Magical Lifesteal increased by 12% and their Magical Power increased by 15 or their Physical Lifesteal increased by 12% and their Physical Power increased by 15.

25769.name: Vampiric Shroud
25769.passive: PASSIVE - Damaging any enemy with an ability restores 2 health and 6 mana. Can only trigger once per target per ability. Can be upgraded at level 20.

25770.name: Blood-soaked Shroud
25770.passive: PASSIVE - Damaging any enemy with an ability restores 1.2% Health and Mana. Can only trigger once per target per ability.

25771.name: Sacrificial Shroud
25771.passive: PASSIVE - Your abilities deal 15% more damage, but cost 3% of your Maximum Health. If the cost would kill you, you instead don't pay the cost.

25772.name: Hunter's Cowl
25772.passive: AURA - While you are within 55 units of an allied god you gain 20% Attack Speed Aura. If you are alone you instead gain 10% Movement Speed.

25773.name: Leather Cowl
25773.passive: PASSIVE - While you are within 55 units of an allied god you gain 10% Attack Speed. If you are alone you instead gain 5% Movement Speed. Can be upgraded at level 20.

25774.name: Leader's Cowl
25774.passive: AURA - You provide 5% increased Power to all nearby allied gods. This aura gains a bonus stack for each ally god within 55 units causing it to provide an additional 3% increased Power. For each enemy god within 55 units a stack is removed.

25775.name: Jotunn's Vigor
25775.passive: GLYPH - If you drop beneath 60% health, gain 15% Movement Speed and 30% Physical Ability Lifesteal for 8s. This effect may only occur once every 15s.

25855.name: Raven Ward
25855.passive: This is a ward that flies along a 500 unit line that allows you to see enemy movements within 50 units. It does not respect line of sight and can see through stealth. Can only carry one at a time.

25873.name: Crimson Claws
25873.passive: PASSIVE - Lifestealing from enemies while at full Health grants you the value healed as a Shield, which may not exceed 15% of your Maximum Health.

25884.name: Divine Barrier
25884.passive:
Deploy a 40 unit wide wall of divine light that reduces the damage of all enemy Basic Attacks that pass through it by 30%. Additionally, all allies that pass through the barrier have their Movement Speed increased by 5% for 3s while enemies that pass through it are Slowed by 30% for 3s. The barrier lasts for 30s. Cooldown - 100s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Kill or assist minions to upgrade this Relic for free.

25889.name: Greater Divine Barrier
25889.passive:
Deploy a 40 unit wide wall of divine light that reduces the damage of all enemy Basic Attacks that pass through it by 30%. Additionally, all allies that pass through the barrier have their Movement Speed increased by 5% for 3s while enemies that pass through it are Slowed by 30% for 3s. The barrier lasts for 30s. Cooldown - 80s.
<font color='#f59b56'>Deal instances of damage or Crowd Control to enemy Gods to upgrade this Relic for free. You may only gain one stack per second.

25890.name: Blessed Barrier
25890.passive: Deploy a 40 unit wide wall of divine light that reduces the damage of all enemy Basic Attacks that pass through it by 30% and increases the damage of all allied Basic Attacks by 20%. Additionally, all allies that pass through the barrier have their Movement Speed increased by 5% for 3s while enemies that pass through it are Slowed by 30% for 3s. The barrier lasts for 30s. Cooldown - 80s.

25912.name: Proximity Ward
25912.passive: This is a ward that allows you to see enemy movements within 20 units. It does respect line of sight and can't see through walls or stealth. If an enemy god enters its vision range, the ward will explode after 1.5s in a 45 unit radius, Slowing enemy gods by 20% for 3s and revealing them for 10s. It remains for 5 minutes or until killed. Can only carry one at a time. Unlocks at level 5.

25931.name: Devoted Deathbringer
25931.passive: PASSIVE - Critical Strike bonus damage dealt is increased by 25%. <n>GLYPH - Your Critical Strike Chance is multiplied by 1.2. For each 5% Critical Strike Chance you go over 100% Critical Strike Chance, you gain 5 Physical Power.

25932.name: Envenomed Executioner
25932.passive: PASSIVE - Basic Attacks against an enemy reduce your target's Physical Protection by 7% for 3s (max. 4 stacks). <n>GLYPH - Successfully hitting an Enemy God will afflict them with a stack of poison for 3s (max. 4 stacks). This poison reduces their healing by 10% and Shields applied on them are reduced by 12.5%.

26100.name: Stormseeker
26100.passive: PASSIVE - When you hit an enemy god with a Basic Attack, gain a permanent stacking Attack Speed buff. Each stack grants 0.25% Attack Speed for a max of 999 stacks.

26127.name: Equinox
26127.passive: PASSIVE - When you hit an enemy with a Basic Attack from the front, you heal for 1 + 1 Health per level, which is increased by 50% if the target is a god. When you hit an enemy with a Basic Attack from the back, you deal an additional 15 + 3 Physical damage per level.

26145.name: Curseweaver
26145.passive: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy god with a Basic Attack or Ability marks them for 4s. When the marked enemy god casts an ability, they take 5% of your Maximum Health + 7.5% of your Maximum Mana as Magical damage. You heal for 100% of the damage dealt. You may only apply a mark once every 20s. Each time an enemy casts an ability within 55 units of you, reduce the cooldown of this item by 1s.

26147.name: Duality
26147.passive: PASSIVE - Once every 3s, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 25% damage as Physical Ability damage. This damage can trigger ability item effects.

26228.name: Keen Blade
26228.passive: PASSIVE - Your Basic Attacks deal an additional 10% of your Basic Attack Power as Physical damage.

26230.name: Piercing Star
26230.passive: PASSIVE - Every 5s, your next ability deals 2% of the target’s Maximum Health as Physical damage.

26231.name: Swift Edge
26231.passive: PASSIVE - Damaging an enemy god with an ability grants 3% Movement Speed toward them for 3s. Stacks up to 3 times.

26233.name: Book of Secrets
26233.passive: PASSIVE - Each time you damage an enemy god with an ability, gain a stack. Each stack grants nothing, but when you upgrade this item, these stacks transfer to the upgraded item. You may only gain one stack every 4s, and can only gain stacks once per god per ability hit. Max 50 stacks.

26235.name: Renewing Talisman
26235.passive: PASSIVE - Gain a stack each time you damage or are damaged by an enemy god, once per ability. Upon reaching 5 stacks, lose all stacks and restore 100 Mana in a 40 unit radius around you.

26236.name: Daimyo’s Kusari
26236.passive: PASSIVE - For each enemy god within 55 units of you, reduce all enemy god’s Magical Protections by 4. For each ally within 55 units of you, increase all allied gods’ Attack Speed by 5%.

26238.name: Steel Crest
26238.passive: PASSIVE - Each time you are hit by a Basic Attack, gain a stack. You may only gain one stack per second. At 4 stacks, remove all stacks and gain a 75 Health Shield that lasts for 5s or until destroyed.

26318.name: Hastened Fatalis
26318.passive: PASSIVE - Hitting an enemy with a Basic Attack grants Haste for 1s, causing you to be immune to the Basic Attack Movement Penalty.

26319.name: Ichaival
26319.passive: PASSIVE - Every successful Basic Attack increases your Physical Power by 5, reduces your target's Physical Power from items by 5, and reduces your target’s Magical Power from items by 10 for 6s. (Max. 4 Stacks)

26320.name: Stone Cutting Sword
26320.passive: PASSIVE - Melee Basic Attacks decrease enemy Physical Protection by 7, and increase your Physical Protection by 7 for 3s (max. 3 Stacks).

26321.name: Ring of Hecate
26321.passive: PASSIVE - Each successful Basic Attack applies a hex to enemies and empowers you, increasing your Magical Power by 5% and reducing the Physical and Magical Power of your opponent by 5% for 5s. (Max. 3 Stacks).

26322.name: Ancile
26322.passive: PASSIVE - Whenever you take Magical Damage from an enemy ability you unleash a shockwave that Silences all enemies within a range of 30 units for 1s. This effect cannot trigger more than once every 30s. While this effect is on cooldown, gain 20 Physical Power and 35 Magical Power.

26323.name: Shield of the Phoenix
26323.passive: PASSIVE - Anytime you hit an Enemy god with an ability you are healed for 2% of your maximum Health and Mana. This can only trigger once per god per ability.

26324.name: Shifter's Shield
26324.passive: PASSIVE - While over 75% Health, you gain 20 Physical Power and 30 Magical Power. While under 75% Health, you gain 20 Protections.

26325.name: Hide of the Nemean Lion
26325.passive: PASSIVE - Reflect 15% of all Basic Attack damage back to the attacker as Physical Damage.
